summary: OTLP export integration tests for Core metrics have become noisy due to recent Core dependency updates causing grpc response errors. Tests were disabled pending a proper mock collector implementation.
userImpact: Integration tests are disabled, reducing test coverage for OTLP metrics export functionality and preventing validation of metrics export behavior.
rootCause: Recent update to Core or its underlying dependencies changed how the OTLP emitter handles grpc responses from the collector service, causing the bare HTTP2 mock server to fail validation.
proposedFix: Rewrite the integration tests to use a more convincing mock OTLP collector that properly handles grpc responses.
workaround: Tests have been disabled temporarily until proper mock implementation is available.
resolutionDetails: Tests were disabled as a temporary measure pending rewrite of the mock collector infrastructure.
